title: Holiday Schedule & Winter Break Information
description: Important information about our holiday schedule and winter break closures.

content.data:
Dear ClassX Community,

As we approach the holiday season, we want to inform you about our winter break schedule:

Holiday Schedule:
• December 24-25: Platform closed
• December 31-January 1: Platform closed
• January 2: Normal operations resume

During the break:
• All courses will remain accessible
• Support will be limited
• New enrollments will be processed after January 2

We wish you all a wonderful holiday season and a happy new year! Thank you for being part of the ClassX community.

Best regards,
The ClassX Team

content.caption: Happy Holidays from the ClassX Team!
